name: Super Mario 64 Land
overview: Super Mario 64 Land is a ROM Hack of SM64 that is focused more linear designed levels with more diversity with its level design and themes than the original. The hack was set to include every power-up featured in SM64: Last Impact and with the main power-ups from Super Mario 3D Land and World (The super leaf and the super bell). The hack has 130 stars across eight worlds, each world featuring somewhere from 5 to 6 playable levels.
